DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Irritation Potential Tazarotene Foam Skin Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 , single center , evaluator-blinded , randomize , vehicle control study evaluate potential tazarotene foam induce cutaneous irritation use 21 day cumulative irritation assay healthy adult volunteer . Approximately 40 healthy male female volunteer subject age 18 65 year enrol . All subject expose patch contain tazarotene foam , vehicle foam , sodium lauryl sulfate 0.5 % ( positive control ) , distilled water ( negative control ) . Each set patch apply randomize site daily 21 day ; patch remove 24 Â±1 hour patch site evaluate sign inflammatory skin response ( eg , erythema , edema , papule ) superficial effect .
